page.title: 11Life in New Addington
page.content: I asked my dad what he thought about livng in New Addington.He said that it was like living in a blind alley.Then I asked what the good things were "its next to the country" he said."what are the bad things"I asked.He said "there was a lack of amenities.I asked him if he would like to live somewhere else.He said yes he would like to live somewhere else. He is a fireman. Then I asked my dads girlfriend what she thought about living in New Addington. She said that she didn't like to think about it.Then I asked her what the good things were and she said the same as my dad that it is near the country.Then I asked her what the bad things were.She said there were more bad points than good points.She would like to live somewhere else as well.She is a short- hand typist.
